original_text: And if any man die very suddenly by him, and he hath defiled the head of his consecration; then he shall shave his head in the day of his cleansing, on the seventh day shall he shave it.
korean_text: 누가 갑자기 그 곁에서 죽어서 스스로 구별한 자의 머리를 더럽히면 그의 몸을 정결하게 하는 날에 머리를 밀 것이니 곧 일곱째 날에 밀 것이며

sentences.original_text: And if any man die very suddenly by him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 어떤 사람이 그 사람 곁에서 갑자기 죽으면,

sentences.original_text: and he hath defiled the head of his consecration;
then he shall shave his head
in the day of his cleansing,
on the seventh day shall he shave it.
sentences.korean_translation: 일곱째 날에 그것을 깎아야 할 것이다.
